languages.text: "Стоит проверить, штатно ли происходила смена караула. Если злоумышленник и правда блюститель или выдает себя за него, то он мог организовать пробел в дежурствах, использовав свой авторитет".
"We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."
languages.original_text: "Стоит проверить, штатно ли происходила смена караула. Если злоумышленник и правда блюститель или выдает себя за него, то он мог организовать пробел в дежурствах, использовав свой авторитет".

traits.locale_text: "We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."
"We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."
"We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."
"We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."
"We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."
"We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."

languages.text: «Deberíamos comprobar que el cambio de turno fue sin incidentes. Si el culpable es un agente o se hace pasar por uno, podría haberse abierto paso en los cambios de guardia».
languages.original_text: "We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."

traits.locale_text: «Deberíamos comprobar que el cambio de turno fue sin incidentes. Si el culpable es un agente o se hace pasar por uno, podría haberse abierto paso en los cambios de guardia».

languages.text: 「何事もなく交代が行われたかどうかを調べる必要があります。犯人が本当にエンフォーサーか、そのふりをしているのか。彼は警備員のシフトの間に隙間ができるよう、画策した可能性があります」
languages.original_text: "We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."

traits.locale_text: 「何事もなく交代が行われたかどうかを調べる必要があります。犯人が本当にエンフォーサーか、そのふりをしているのか。彼は警備員のシフトの間に隙間ができるよう、画策した可能性があります」

languages.text: “我们得弄清楚换班过程中有没有发生事故。如果那个罪犯真的是执法者，或者是假扮成执法者，那他很可能会在换班时间上做些手脚，导致现场某段时间无人监管。”
languages.original_text: "We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."

traits.locale_text: “我们得弄清楚换班过程中有没有发生事故。如果那个罪犯真的是执法者，或者是假扮成执法者，那他很可能会在换班时间上做些手脚，导致现场某段时间无人监管。”

languages.text: "Wir sollten in Erfahrung bringen, ob der Schichtwechsel reibungslos verlaufen ist. Sollte der Täter wirklich ein Enforcer sein oder dies vorgeben, hätte er für eine Lücke zwischen den Schichten sorgen können."
languages.original_text: "We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollten in Erfahrung bringen, ob der Schichtwechsel reibungslos verlaufen ist. Sollte der Täter wirklich ein Enforcer sein oder dies vorgeben, hätte er für eine Lücke zwischen den Schichten sorgen können."

languages.text: « Nous devrions nous renseigner pour savoir si le changement de quart s'est déroulé sans incident. Si le coupable est vraiment un prévôt ou se fait passer pour l'un d'eux, il a très bien pu faire en sorte qu'il y ait un décalage entre les deux veilles. »
languages.original_text: "We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devrions nous renseigner pour savoir si le changement de quart s'est déroulé sans incident. Si le coupable est vraiment un prévôt ou se fait passer pour l'un d'eux, il a très bien pu faire en sorte qu'il y ait un décalage entre les deux veilles. »

languages.text: "Vardiya değişiminin olaysız geçip geçmediğini öğrenmeliyiz. Suçlu, gerçekten de bir infazcıysa ya da infazcı rolü yapıyorsa muhafız vardiyaları arasındaki boşluk olmasını organize etmiş olabilir."
languages.original_text: "We should find out if the shift change took place without incident. If the culprit truly is an enforcer or is pretending to be one, he could have orchestrated a gap between the guard shifts."
